about.title: About Us
about.description: Özyürek Şekerleme presents the traditional Turkish delight and candy culture to the modern world by combining it with family recipes that have been going on for years. Our products, prepared with the finest ingredients and craftsmanship, have become indispensable for those who love traditional tastes.
about.mission: Our mission is to introduce our cultural heritage to the whole world and represent the traditional delight taste internationally.
